Once a bad guy sneaks into one computer in a network, lateral movement is when they jump from computer to computer like hopscotch, looking for the computer with the best stuff to steal!

In this lesson, we'll learn about hunting for lateral movement in a way that makes sense. We'll start simple, use real examples, and build your understanding step by step. By the end, you'll understand the core ideas and why they matter!
